Welcome to CS4SG@UB

Computing for Social Good

Research

Our faculty and students actively work on projects covering a broad range of exciting, cutting-edge topics including AI, big data, bioinformatics, cloud services, computing research, crypto-currency, cyber security, machine learning, Internet of Things, self-driving cars, smartphones, and 5G wireless.

Machine Learning
Bias in NLP
FAI

All Research Projects

Education

Addressing retention, diversity, and persistence in computing through educational approaches are targeted. Overall, the objective is developing a skilled and diverse workforce in computing for Social Good for the future.

~ Department of Computer Science and Engineering, UB
